public class SplashActivity
extends android.app.Activity

Splash activity of the application This is the activity responsible for displaying the splash screen when opening the application.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Aidan Wynne Fewster

Method Detail

onCreate

protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
Overrides:
onCreate in class android.app.Activity

getActivityClass

private java.lang.Class<?> getActivityClass()
Returns the class of the next activity to start. If the user isn't logged in then Login activity will be returned. If the user is logged in but the database isn't complete then the Download activity is returned. Otherwise the Main activity is returned.

Returns:
the class of the activity to open after splash screen.

startSplashScreenThread

private void startSplashScreenThread(java.lang.Class<?> startActivityClass)
Makes the user wait *WAIT_TIME* milliseconds while displaying the splash screen, afterwards the activity passed in is launched.

Parameters:
startActivityClass - class of the activity to open after splash screen.
